physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 46 x 28, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 35 x 50, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 73 x 35, (A) 5 lines, top right margins, (B) blank, (4) 65 x 38, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 52 x 59, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) 2 lines, left top margins, (6) 38 x 33, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, left margin, (7) 35 x 39, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 25 x 28, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (9) 48 x 48, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (10) 58 x 67, (A) 5 lines, right margin (?), (B) 1 line, top margin (?), (11) 60 x 38, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) 8 lines, no margins, (12) 60 x 27, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 28 x 38, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (14) 40 x 29, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (15) 38 x 24, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) 4 lines, no margin, (16) 33 x 25, 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank
